backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access‑controlled user profiles and order storage with queries and mutations for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a text‑update requirement to the affected frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/GO_LIVE.md: Go‑live runbook detailing pre‑flight checks, business info verification, and deployment steps with no code changes allowed.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining brand color tokens and dark‑mode variants using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_PRODUCTION.md: Production smoke‑test checklist for verifying core functionality, assets, and UI after deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating layout, authentication, dialogs, and order flow.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section showing phone, location, and Instagram info from BUSINESS_INFO.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying business details, social link, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with logo, business info, and phone/Instagram action buttons.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the hero section with background image, tagline, and buttons for ordering or viewing speciality.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout handling using Internet Identity with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/OrderDialog.tsx: Implements a form dialog to submit custom bat orders and shows a success message after submission.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Shows a grid of product features highlighting bat quality and construction.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Displays a dialog prompting users to enter and save basic profile information.
frontend/src/components/Speciality.tsx: Presents speciality information with three cards describing customization options.
frontend/src/config/business.ts: Defines all business information used throughout the site including contact details and tagline.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and orders through an ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings using CSS variable‑based OKLCH themes.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests for the Meerut Tennis Bats project.
